"Task Mastery" - A Psychological Thriller: This series delves into the lives of individuals who excel in their work, only to discover that their accomplishments come at a terrible cost. As the main character, a brilliant but struggling artist, becomes increasingly consumed by jealousy, they begin to uncover a dark conspiracy behind the success of their peers. Each episode explores a different profession, revealing the psychological manipulation and exploitation that drives individuals to excel at any cost. The twist: the main character's own success is not what it seems, and their journey to the truth will challenge everything they thought they knew about themselves and the world around them.

"The Envy Effect" - A Social Experiment: This reality TV show brings together a group of individuals from diverse backgrounds, each with their own unique talents and passions. As they work together to complete various tasks, the camera captures the subtle (and not-so-subtle) moments of jealousy and competition that arise. But here's the twist: the contestants are not aware that their tasks are designed to amplify their envy, pushing them to their limits and beyond. Will they be able to overcome their insecurities and work together, or will the envy effect tear them apart?

"The Inevitable Rise" - A Historical Drama: Set in ancient Greece, this series follows the story of a young philosopher who becomes consumed by jealousy as they watch their peers rise to fame and success. As they navigate the treacherous world of ancient politics, they begin to uncover a web of deceit and corruption that threatens to destroy everything they hold dear. But when they discover a long-lost text that holds the secrets of true success, they must decide whether to use its power for personal gain or to bring down the corrupt system.

"The Shadow Self" - A Psychological Drama: This series follows a successful businesswoman who, on the surface, appears to have it all. But beneath the fa√ßade, she struggles with feelings of inadequacy and jealousy towards her colleagues. As she navigates the cutthroat world of corporate politics, she begins to uncover the dark secrets of her own past and the true nature of her envy. But when she discovers a mysterious figure who seems to be manipulating her every move, she must confront the shadow self she's been trying to keep hidden.
"The Green-Eyed Monster" - A Fantasy Adventure: In a world where magic is tied to emotions, a young apprentice discovers that their jealousy is not just a weakness, but a powerful force
